Title: Crossroads
Plot: Jack, Andie's brother scores a job at the Ice House, an entry in Joey's diary lands her in hot water with Dawson, who forgets Pacey's 16th Birthday. Meanwhile Abby begins to become a negative influence over lonely Jen.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Tom Nowicki, Amber Dority, Lorri Lindberg
